titleInfo.title: First observations on colony structure, behavior and vocal repertoire of the South American fur seal (Arctocephalus australis, Zimmermann 1783) in Peru

bibliographicCitation.lncs: Trillmich, F., Majluf, P.: First observations on colony structure, behavior and vocal repertoire of the South American fur seal (Arctocephalus australis, Zimmermann 1783) in Peru. Zeitschrift für Säugetierkunde. 46, 310-322 (1981).
